Zoop: Inheritance (extends) not flattening parent fields into child struct
description: Zoop v0.1.5 codegen claims to flatten parent fields when using 'pub const extends = Parent' but generated code only contains child fields. EventTarget fields (event_listener_list) not present in AbortSignal or Node. Breaks all DOM interfaces that extend EventTarget.
design: Zoop codegen.zig:23 says 'Flatten parent and mixin fields directly into child struct' but this is not happening. Need to investigate codegen logic or file upstream bug report.

DOM Phase 2.1.1: Element - Core attributes and basic methods
description:
# Element Interface - Core Attributes and Basic Methods

## Goal
Implement core Element functionality including tag name, namespaces, id, className, and basic element identification.

## Prerequisites
- ✅ whatwg-3kk (Element Foundation) must be complete first
- ✅ Node interface complete (it is)

## Context
- **File**: `webidl/src/dom/element.zig` (already exists from whatwg-3kk)
- **Spec**: WHATWG DOM Standard §4.8
- **IDL**: `specs/dom.md` Element interface section

## What to Implement

### 1. Core Fields
Add to Element struct:
```zig
pub const Element = webidl.interface(struct {
    pub const extends = Node;
    
    /// Tag name (e.g., "div", "span", "p")
    tag_name: []const u8,
    
    /// Element ID (corresponds to id attribute)
    id: ?[]const u8,
    
    /// Class name (corresponds to class attribute)
    class_name: ?[]const u8,
});
```

### 2. Readonly Attributes (6)
```zig
pub fn get_tagName(self: *const Element) webidl.DOMString
pub fn get_id(self: *const Element) webidl.DOMString
pub fn get_className(self: *const Element) webidl.DOMString
pub fn get_namespaceURI(self: *const Element) ?webidl.DOMString
pub fn get_prefix(self: *const Element) ?webidl.DOMString
pub fn get_localName(self: *const Element) webidl.DOMString
```

### 3. Setters (2)
```zig
pub fn set_id(self: *Element, value: webidl.DOMString) !void
pub fn set_className(self: *Element, value: webidl.DOMString) !void
```

### 4. Update init/deinit for memory safety

## Success Criteria
- ✅ All 6 readonly getters + 2 setters implemented
- ✅ 12+ comprehensive tests
- ✅ No memory leaks
- ✅ All tests pass

## Time Estimate
~2 hours

## Depends On
whatwg-3kk (Element Foundation)

title: Implement ReadableStreamBYOBReader fully
